Lines.Description: If block_x == math_x2 AND block_y == math_y2 ELSE GOTO 00000508
Print 'Runtime Error: no loaded talkpad' on quit

If actor_spawnerid == newvalue AND actor_uniqueid != newvalue ELSE GOTO 00001134

If teleport is not zero ELSE GOTO 00001540
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00001652
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00001740

If camera_x > Player_X / XRes * XRes ELSE GOTO 00001982

If camera_y > Player_y / yres * yres ELSE GOTO 00002122
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_left

If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_down ELSE GOTO 00002522

If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_down ELSE GOTO 00002684
Print 'Error: Level needs to be at least as tall as the current Y Resolution value {yres}' on quit

If audiodriver == audiodriver_ptplayer OR audiodriver == audiodriver_mdsdrv ELSE GOTO 00003462
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003566
If newvalue is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003622

If newvalue is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003880

If true is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004018

If music is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004378
Print 'Too much RAM used ({chipram} bytes). Consider reducing max active actors or largest map size.' on quit

If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005034
Print 'Cannot change yres while level loaded' on quit
If yres & 0xf is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005152
Print 'Y resolution must be multiples of 16 on Neo Geo' on quit
If actor_x >= camera_x + XRes ELSE GOTO 00005256
If actor_y >= camera_y + yres ELSE GOTO 00005322

If actor_x > xres + camera_x ELSE GOTO 00006690

If control1jump is not zero ELSE GOTO 00006916
